description: Matt Prater nails a 32-yard field goal as time expires to win it for Buffalo, completing a stunning comeback.
Derrick Henry fumbles after Ed Oliver punches it out; Terrel Bernard recovers, flipping momentum to the Bills late.
On 4th-and-2, Josh Allen’s tipped pass finds Keon Coleman for a wild touchdown to keep Buffalo alive.
Christian Benford tackles DeAndre Hopkins short of the sticks on 3rd down, forcing a punt and setting up Buffalo’s winning drive.
Josh Allen leaps over the pile and breaks the plane for a clutch goal-line touchdown to make it a two-point game.
